name: Master Blends 3 - Robusto
additionalNotes: Oliva Master Blends is gem drafted from exclusive tobaccos the award-winning brand initially reserved for Oliva family members only. The supremely rare blend was originally released in select quantities to the general public on an annual basis only and has become a coveted cigar among Oliva fans as well as cigar-lovers who prefer a top-shelf Nicaraguan profile. A lustrous Connecticut Broadleaf wrapper conceals a hearty and luscious core of Cuban-seed, Nicaraguan Ligero tobaccos procured from prized Oliva family estates. Well-rounded notes of dark chocolate and coffee with cream accompany earthy spices with a touch of brown sugar and leather throughout a mouthwatering finish.Â
